t: Alpha-Bits - Wikipedia
s: April 1, 2025 - Alpha-Bits, also known as Frosted Alpha-Bits (styled as AlphA-Bits), was, as its name implies, a breakfast cereal made by Post Consumer Brands, which contained frosted alphabet-shaped multi-grain (whole-grain oat and corn flour) cereal bits.
